ygData.subject: Re: Seeking advice...
ygData.msgSnippet: I want to thank everyone for taking the time to reply to my post.  Our guild is doing another dragon run again tonight or planes =( (at least that s the rumor)
ygData.messageBody:
I want to thank everyone for taking the time to reply to my post. Our guild
is doing another dragon run again tonight or planes =( (at least that's the
rumor) I am more nervous then I can say. Thanks for all the advise...I've
printed out all of y'all's replies so I can read it while I play...EGAD
that's a confidence builder there isn't it?! Good thing the tanks in my
group won't know ;P

I'll try not to die as much tonight...dont want my friend to come back to
find she now has a lvl 48 character or something =P

Last night, after dying so much, I started to make sure I kept a really
really really good distance from the battle. Hope that's the way to do
it...I was so good at keeping the distance that I couldn't cast at the tanks
cause they were "out of range" =/ So I wasted a few precious second trying
to get closer to the battle to heal while the health bar was going down
steadily...was too stressful. Then I got close enough, maybe too close, to
heal and die...again...*sigh* On the bright side...I was the only one in my
group that die majority of the time...all the tanks were kept alive pretty
well most of the time...can't say the same for the enchanter and the shammie
in my group though =/ They went down too fast for me to heal. I'm pretty
sure I'll get the exact science of this sooner or later =/

I have no idea being a cleric can be this stressful.
